mapper.select: select station_name as stopName, inorder as stopOrder, jingdu, weidu, side from ytcx_line_station ls left join ytcx_line yl on ls.sub_lineid = yl.sub_lineid left join (select * from ytcx_station where station_name is not null) ys on ls.station_id = ys.siteid where linename = #{lineName} and yl.upordown = #{directionEnum} order by inorder
